backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with data types for tasks, finances, user profiles, documents, bans, and tap‑to‑earn state plus storage maps and mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a migration that upgrades tap‑to‑earn state by adding a remainderTaps field while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting Bangla locale and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication state, ban checks, theming, and routing shell.
frontend/src/components/ads/TapToEarnAdI: Interstitial ad dialog for tap‑to‑earn, loading external ads when available and falling back to local creatives.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Main application layout handling auth state, bans, profile view toggling, and rendering primary tabs or onboarding UI.
Renders three main tabs (earn, finance, e-services) with their respective landing components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/kyc/Verification: Dialog prompting users to complete email or NID verification before accessing restricted features.
frontend/src/components/policy/BanNotice: Displays a destructive alert banner if the user account is banned, showing the ban reason.
frontend/src/components/policy/PolicyAcc: Gates app content behind mandatory terms/privacy acceptance stored per principal in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for creating a new user profile with required fields and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/referrals/Referr: Shows the user’s referral code, copy button, and referral count.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines configurable external ad settings for tap-to-earn features with fallback control.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAccessCont: Queries the caller’s user role and admin status via actor methods.
Provides hooks to query, ban, and unban users, tied to principal-based ban status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile using actor methods with cache invalidation.
Queries and mutations for fetching documents and uploading encrypted sensitive documents with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEarnings.t: Fetches user balance and referral bonus using actor methods.
Provides hooks to fetch e‑service requests and submit new service requests with related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useFinance.ts: Hooks for fetching and submitting micro‑loan and DPS requests, handling success and error toasts.
Manages referral code, referral list retrieval, and registration mutations.
Implements Tap‑to‑Earn state queries, tap registration, batching, and coin claiming with cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTasks.ts: Hooks to fetch task catalog and completed tasks plus mutations to start and complete tasks with rewards.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWithdrawal: Handles fetching withdrawal requests and submitting new withdrawal operations with balance refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, storing identity and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useTapBatching.ts: Utility hook batching tap events, performing timed flushes, optimistic updates, and error recovery.
frontend/src/hooks/useTapToEarnAdSchedul: React hook managing tap-to-earn ad display state, handling scheduling, closing, and ban-based cancellation.
frontend/src/i18n/bn-BD.ts: Bangla localization file containing UI strings for common actions, earnings, finance, withdrawal, and tap-to-earn features.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Provides translation lookup and interpolation for bn-BD strings plus BDT currency and number formatters.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBanPanel.t: Admin UI for banning and unbanning users by principal ID with form handling, validation, and error display.
frontend/src/pages/earn/EarningsDashboar: Dashboard showing user balance, task earnings, referrals, and referral bonus using query-based data.
frontend/src/pages/earn/EarnLanding.tsx: Landing page for earnings features with navigation between tasks, withdrawals, and tap-to-earn views.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TapToEarnPage.ts: Implements tap-to-earn logic with optimistic state, ad scheduling at tap thresholds, and coin claiming while handling bans. Manages tap events, ad triggers, and UI interactions for earning coins.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TaskCatalog.tsx: Displays available tasks grouped by type with icons and rewards, allowing users to select a task for details. Handles loading states and empty task lists.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TaskDetail.tsx: Shows task details, instructions, and allows starting and submitting proof for a task. Prevents interaction when banned and handles form submission states.
frontend/src/pages/earn/WithdrawPage.tsx: Provides withdrawal form with support for bank, mobile, and global methods, validating inputs and sending withdrawal requests. Also displays balance, past requests, and ban restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceHis: Lists the user's past e‑service requests with status indicators and descriptions. Handles loading and empty history states.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceLan: Landing page to browse e‑services, navigate to request forms, or view history. Renders service cards and manages view transitions.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceReq: Form page for submitting e-service requests with email verification and ban checks.
frontend/src/pages/finance/DollarBuySell: Placeholder page showing that dollar buy/sell functionality is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/finance/DPSPage.tsx: Allows users to create DPS requests with amount, term, and purpose, requiring NID verification.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceLandin: Landing hub for finance features, routing between loan, DPS, transfer, and dollar exchange views.
frontend/src/pages/finance/MicroLoanPage: Provides a micro-loan application form with amount, purpose, and repayment inputs, gated by NID verification.
frontend/src/pages/finance/MoneyTransfer: Placeholder page indicating money transfer features are under development.
frontend/src/pages/kyc/KYCPage.tsx: KYC document upload page supporting encrypted uploads for various identity document types.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: React profile page allowing viewing and editing user info, navigating to KYC and admin panels, and displaying referral data.
frontend/src/types/monetag.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file placeholder for Monetag types.
frontend/src/utils/ads/inventory.ts: Defines static ad creatives and provides functions to fetch ads sequentially, randomly, or based on tap thresholds.
frontend/src/utils/ads/monetag.ts: Empty utility file reserved for Monetag ad logic.
frontend/src/utils/crypto/clientEncrypti: Implements AES‑GCM client‑side encryption and decryption for document bytes using Web Crypto API.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting BDT amounts plus tap‑to‑earn coin credit calculations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Bangla localization, BDT currency rules, and ad system updates.
